definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: He shall have his medal and diploma in the above-mentioned event withdrawn," the IOC said.
sentences.chinese: 他在前述赛事中的金牌与荣誉证书应被收回。

sentences.english: The employer may, on the basis of aforesaid regulation, terminate the labor contract.
sentences.chinese: 用人单位依据前述规定，均可以终止劳动合同。

sentences.english: Imagine you are a different plug-in and wanted to use the aforementioned functionality.
sentences.chinese: 假定您是一个不同的插件并且想要使用前述功能。

sentences.english: The three previous approaches to the weather badge library had one trait in common.
sentences.chinese: 前述三种天气面板库的实现方法有一个共同的特点。

sentences.english: To do this, import the preceding schema to get the necessary redefines.
sentences.chinese: 为此，导入前述的模式以进行必要的重定义。

sentences.english: It said the operation should have an impact on all of those activities.
sentences.chinese: 它说，这次行动应该会对前述这些活动产生影响。

sentences.english: The Configuration unit actually sits above all the other sub-systems.
sentences.chinese: 配置子系统实际位于前述子系统之上。

sentences.english: Assets that cannot be classified under the asset headings above.
sentences.chinese: 指不能归属于前述各款之资产。

sentences.english: The preceding flow is best explained with an example.
sentences.chinese: 前述的流程是对例子的最好解释。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is necessary to do in-depth research into the above subject.
sentences.chinese: 因此，关于前述的课题如何改善实有深入探讨的必要。

sentences.english: A given Package may consist of either the Standard Version, or a Modified Version.
sentences.chinese: 前述套装软体可能单指标准版本或修改版本。

sentences.english: Current assets that cannot be classified under the above current asset headings.
sentences.chinese: 指不能归属于前述各款之流动资产。

sentences.english: The embodiment of the invention also discloses a plug-in frame comprising the finished board.
sentences.chinese: 本发明实施方式还公开了包括前述成品板的插框。

sentences.english: Previews and recalls are a good sign of poor organization.
sentences.chinese: 组织不好，就是看“前述”与“后述”这两个东西。

sentences.english: It is my great appreciation that my will could be announced fairly and righteously as stated.
sentences.chinese: 对于我的遗嘱能如前述公平公正地公布，我深表感激。

sentences.english: The foregoing story was by an English writer.
sentences.chinese: 前述的故事是一个英国作家写的。

definition: according to this/on the ground of the above/(formally introduces reported speech in writing)
another case (in law)/a case to treat separately
to infer/to consider and come to a judgment/to recommend/to estimate/deduced to be
to be qualified (to bring a complaint, lawsuit etc) (law)
